name: Lineup (LineUpGame)
description:
Welcome to Lineup! The alien interrogation game!

You are tasked with solving a murder... the most murderous of murders: Killing with a spoon!

You and a friend must team-up and ask questions to the witnesses to find out what the killer looks like. Do they have blue skin? Are their eyes red? Are they wearing a tuxedo? Only you can find out! 

From the final lineup of suspects you must choose the one that you think is the killer!

Controls: 

Mouse / LMB: Click on things!

Keyboard: Type stuff!

P: Open the Escape & Volume menu!
